questions.question: What tag groups inline elements without semantic meaning?
questions.explanation: span groups inline content for styling purposes.

questions.question: What tag defines a table row?
questions.explanation: tr creates table rows containing cells.

questions.question: What tag defines a table data cell?
questions.explanation: td creates standard table data cells.

questions.question: What tag creates an ordered list?
What tag defines a list item?
What tag creates a form for user input?
questions.explanation: form collects and submits user data.

questions.question: What tag creates a text input field?
questions.explanation: input creates various form input fields.

questions.question: What tag groups block-level content?
questions.explanation: div creates container divisions for layout.

questions.question: What attribute provides alternative text for images?
What tag defines a table header cell?
questions.explanation: th creates header cells in tables.
